always_included_messages.content: Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.

name: root

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"

msg.content: Could you help me create a 7-day travel plan starting on March 18th, 2022, and ending on March 24th, 2022? The trip will start in Washington and I would like to visit 3 cities in Minnesota. This trip is for one person with a budget of $7,200.

Could you help me create a 7-day travel plan starting on March 18th, 2022, and ending on March 24th, 2022? The trip will start in Washington and I would like to visit 3 cities in Minnesota. This trip is for one person with a budget of $7,200.

# Washington to Minnesota

## Friday 18th March
- 10:00 - Depart Washington
- 11:50 - Arrive Minneapolis–Saint Paul International Airport, collect rental car
- 12:30 - Drive to Minneapolis city centre, check in at The Marquette Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton
- 13:30 - Lunch at Capital Grille
- 14:30 - Explore downtown, including the Minneapolis Sculpture Garden and the Foshay Tower
- 19:00 - Dinner at Murray's
- 21:00 - Drinks at The Living Room

## Saturday 19th March
- 10:00 - Breakfast at Hen House Eatery
- 11:00 - Tour the Mill City Museum
- 13:00 - Lunch at Spoon and Stable
- 14:00 - Visit the Minneapolis Art Institute and the Como Park Zoo & Conservatory
- 18:00 - Dinner at 112 Eatery
- 20:00 - Drinks at Tattersall Distilling

## Sunday 20th March
- 09:00 - Breakfast at Al's Breakfast
- 10:00 - Drive to Duluth
- 11:30 - Arrive in Duluth, check in at The Inn on Lake Superior
- 12:30 - Lunch at Northern Waters Smokehaus
- 14:00 - Explore the Great Lakes Aquarium, Skyline Parkway, and the Glensheen Estate
- 19:00 - Dinner at Va Bene Caffe
- 21:00 - Drinks at Vikre Distillery

## Monday 21st March
- 09:00 - Breakfast at At Sara's Table Chester Creek Cafe
- 10:00 - Drive to Bemidji
- 11:30 - Arrive in Bemidji, check in at DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Bemidji
- 12:30 - Lunch at Sparkling Waters
- 14:00 - Explore Lake Bemidji State Park and the Headwaters Science Center
- 19:00 - Dinner at 209 Bar
- 21:00 - Drinks at Keg & Cork

## Tuesday 22nd March
- 09:00 - Breakfast at Raphael's Bakery & Cafe
- 10:00 - Drive back to Duluth
- 12:00 - Arrive in Duluth, check in at Pier B Resort
- 13:00 - Lunch at Vi's Pizza
- 14:00 - Explore the Duluth Children's Museum and the Leif Erikson Park
- 18:00 - Dinner at New Scenic Cafe
- 20:00 - Drinks at Fitger's Brewhouse Brewery and Grille

## Wednesday 23rd March
- 09:00 - Breakfast at Duluth Grill
- 10:00 - Drive to Brainerd
- 11:30 - Arrive in Brainerd, check in at The Brainerd Hotel
- 12:30 - Lunch at The Barn
- 14:00 - Explore Paul Bunyan Land
- 19:00 - Dinner at Ernie's on Gull
- 21:00 - Drinks at Roundhouse Brewery

## Thursday 24th March
- 10:00 - Breakfast at The Blue Ox
- 11:00 - Drive back to Minneapolis
- 12:30 - Arrive in Minneapolis, check in at The Grand Hotel Minneapolis
- 13:30 - Lunch at Juno
- 14:30 - Explore the Mall of America and the Minneapolis Institute of Art
- 18:00 - Dinner at Butcher & the Boar
- 19:30 - Drinks at Tattersall Distilling
- 21:30 - Depart for Washington
